mapper.select: SELECT bac_position.jurisdictionName,bac_position.jurisdictionId,bac_position.`status`,GROUP_CONCAT(bac_user.userName)Staffs FROM bac_position LEFT JOIN bac_user_position ON bac_position.jurisdictionId=bac_user_position.jurisdictionId LEFT JOIN bac_user ON bac_user.ddUserId=bac_user_position.ddUserId GROUP BY bac_position.jurisdictionId
